definitions.definition: A person of lower stature to another
definitions.example: As you are my inferior, I can tell you to do anything I want.
Anna had always felt inferior to her brother due to poor school grades.

definitions.definition: Situated below some other organ; said of a calyx when free from the ovary, and therefore below it, or of an ovary with an adherent and therefore inferior calyx.
On the side of a flower which is next to the bract; anterior.
Nearer to the Sun than the Earth is.
definitions.example: the inferior or interior planets; an inferior conjunction of Mercury or Venus
the inferior part of a meridian
